How to Overcome the Big Data Skills Shortage
articles.Description: In late 2013, when Boston-based business intelligence and analytics software company Lavastorm Analytics surveyed 425 analytics professionals, C-suite executives, managers and business analysts, 83% said analytics was critical to their businesses' success – but 65% said they were unable to hire enough workers with data skills.

articles.Description: Unlike a few years ago, a lot more people understand that services like Google, Facebook or Twitter are not free of charge, but are paid for with our data. articles.Title: Pitfalls Of Using Social Media For Scientific Studies Examined
articles.Description: Behavioral scientists and other academic researchers are increasingly turning to social media to find subjects for their studies, but doing so could lead to erroneous results with serious implications.
